author: Phil Ward
description: A Negroni-style cocktail served up. Heavy on the gin and relatively light on bitter liqueur and vermouth. It's a formula that works but like us, you may prefer yours served on the rocks.
name: Cornwall Negroni
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
